info.name: JIRA 6.2 Dark Pink
info.description: A dark theme for Jira 6.2, based on "JIRA 6.2 Dark", but with hot pink links.
info.additionalInfo:
* origin style: https://userstyles.org/styles/125314/jira-6-2-dark
* JIRA v6.2 can be downloaded at https://www.atlassian.com/software/jira/download-archives.
